[[Category:Monsters]] {| style="background:#f5faff; border:1px solid #cedff2; width:auto; margin: 0px 5%; margin-bottom:1.25em; font-style:italic; text-align:left; color:#000; padding:1.5em 1em;" |- | | style="width: 100%;" | A strong deep elf soldier who wields weapons and battle magic. |} [[Category:Templates]] ==Useful Info== '''Deep elf fighters''' are weak, common [[list of deep elves|deep elves]] armed with decent gear and capable of the same magic as an [[orc wizard]]. They are most commonly found in the [[Elven Halls]], [[the Vaults]] and some [[bailey]]s. ==Spells== [[Category:Spellcaster]]
{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0; width:28em;" ! colspan="3" style="font-size:larger;" | Spell set I |- ! align="left" | Slot1 | [[Magic Dart]] (3d4) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot2 | [[Slow]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot3 | [[Haste]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot4 | [[Blink]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- |}

{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:0; padding:0; width:28em;" ! colspan="3" style="font-size:larger;" | Spell set III |- ! align="left" | Slot1 | [[Throw Frost]] (3d6) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot2 | [[Cantrip]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot3 | [[Haste]] | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot4 | [[Throw Flame]] (3d6) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot5 | [[Magic Dart]] (3d4) | [[Spell slot flags|Wizard flag]] |- ! align="left" | Slot6 | [[Invisibility]] | [[Spell slot flags|Emergency flag]] |- |}
==Tips & Tricks== Even with the slight boost to durability, they're still not much more dangerous than orc wizards. ==History== Deep elf fighters were removed in [[0.18]]. [[category:Elf]]
